ModMetaData.name: ED-Shields-CR
ModMetaData.author: Jaxxa
ModMetaData.description:
Requires: ED-ShieldsBasic, Community Core Library, CombatRealism
-CombatRealism-1.6.7.3 -Community Core Library v0.14.3 -ED-ShieldsBasic Version: 01.00.01
Modifies the Shields from ED-Shields to intercept the projectiles fired by weapons from Combat Realism.
